script.title: policylookups.slax
script.author: liquidbreeze1
script.synopsis: Op script to display concise output of policies with hit count on flow-based junos
script.description: Script to display hit count per policy, a much more terse display than the show security policies detail command. Inspired by a customer who wanted a easier way of seeing hit counts when many policies are configured. For use on junos devices with flow based firewalls. Script handles multiple destination and source addresses, as well as multiple applications.
